sourcesContent:
import { ReactNode } from 'react';
import * as C from './styles';
import { Header } from '../Header';
import { SidebarItem } from '../SidebarItem'

type Props = {
    children: ReactNode;
}

export const Theme = ({ children }: Props) => {
    return (
        <C.Container>
            <C.Area>
                <Header />

                <C.Steps>
                    <C.Sidebar>
                        <SidebarItem 
                            title="Pessoal"
                            description="Se identifique"
                            icon="profile"
                            path="/"
                        />
                        <SidebarItem 
                            title="Profissional"
                            description="Seu nÃ­vel"
                            icon="book"
                            path="/step2"
                        />
                        <SidebarItem 
                            title="Contatos"
                            description="Como te achamos?"
                            icon="mail"
                            path="/step3"
                        />
                    </C.Sidebar>
                    <C.Page>
                        {children}
                    </C.Page>
                </C.Steps>
            </C.Area>
        </C.Container>
    );
}
